general_info.summary: This text provides a categorized list of various programs, schools, reports, initiatives, and informational resources related to Sharda University. It includes academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences and specific courses such as B.Sc. in Chemistry, alongside administrative and student support services like the Academic Bank of Credits, career counseling, and FM radio. The list also covers university governance, historical information, tenders, legal frameworks, COVID-19 updates, and international campus details.
